name: Space Walk Project🚀👨‍🚀
description:
Hello, internet! 👋

This is my first time developing and publishing a game from scratch. This game was meant for my homework, so there isn't any other intention beyond just uploading this to my porfolio.

However all the feedback is appreciated! 🙌

Created using #Unity. Music from Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets?q=audio) and https://soundimage.org/sci-fi/, art by me, code by me.

Controls (Keyboard): Left & Right arrowkeys / Z / LeftCtrl, Space.
